description: Short-Stay Tourist Visa (up to 90 days) for Indian travellers visiting Argentina for tourism. Mandatory consular application; no visa-on-arrival for Indian nationals.

meta.passport_validity: Minimum 6 months beyond date of arrival + 2 blank pages
meta.min_funds_requirement: 3–6 months bank statements showing healthy balance + return flight + hotel booking

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Passport valid for 6+ months from date of travel, with at least two blank pages. Include photocopies of front/back and previous visas.

documents.title: Two Recent Photos
documents.description: 4x4 cm, white background, no shadows, taken within last 6 months.

documents.title: Tourist Visa Application Form
documents.description: Fill the Argentina Tourist Visa form (handwritten in blue ink or digitally filled). Print on 3 separate pages. Attach photograph on page 3. Sign in presence of consular officer.

documents.title: Round-Trip Flight Reservation
documents.description: Return or onward flight booking showing entry and exit to/from Argentina. Dummy booking accepted.

documents.title: Hotel Booking or Invitation Letter
documents.description: Fully refundable hotel reservation OR invitation letter from host with address and ID copies.

documents.title: Bank Statements (Proof of Funds)
documents.description: 3–6 months bank statements, salary slips, ITR-V; must show sufficient balance to cover the trip.

documents.title: Employment Proof / NOC
documents.description: If employed: NOC + leave approval + salary slips. If self-employed: GST/MSME. If student: Bonafide letter.

documents.title: Cover Letter
documents.description: Personal cover letter explaining purpose, travel dates, itinerary, accommodation, and who funds the trip.

steps_flow.title: Download & Fill Visa Application Form
steps_flow.description: Download the tourist visa form from the Argentina Consulate website. Fill it neatly (BLUE ink or typed), print on 3 separate pages, attach photo on page 3.

steps_flow.title: Gather Required Documents
steps_flow.description: Prepare all required documents: passport, photos, flight reservation, accommodation proof, financial statements, employment proof, and cover letter.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment at Argentine Consulate
steps_flow.description: Schedule an appointment at the correct Consulate (Delhi or Mumbai depending on your state). Bring original documents + photocopies.

steps_flow.title: Submit Documents In Person
steps_flow.description: Visit the consulate on your appointment date. Submit all documents, pay visa fee (USD 150), and sign the application in front of the consular officer.

steps_flow.title: Attend Interview
steps_flow.description: You may be interviewed about your itinerary, purpose, employment, and financials. Answer truthfully and confidently.

steps_flow.title: Wait for Visa Processing
steps_flow.description: Processing time is typically 3–6 weeks. Once approved, your passport will be returned with the visa sticker.
